ValidationRule.description: Rule triggers if feedback has a cost attached but the cost fields are blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(Cost_Attached_to_Feedback__c,"Yes") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type_of__c ,"Points"))) && (ISBLANK( Text(Currency__c )) || ( ISNULL(Feedback_Cost__c)) || ( ISNULL( Text( Type_of__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the full cost details to the relevant fields (Currency & Value)
